Baseline treatment type cannot start after an existing Non-Baseline treatment type. 6. Non-Baseline treatment type cannot start before an existing Baseline treatment type. 7. In Choosing the Treatment Assignment codes the following are scenarios are possible. a) When treatmentAssignmentCode is specified then the otherTreatementAssignmentDescription code should be N/A. b) con:config.script:
String firstCourseStartDate = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("firstCourseStartDate") Integer startCycleNumber = Integer.parseInt(testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("startCycleNumber")) Integer courseDurationInDays = Integer.parseInt(testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("courseDurationInDays")) Integer threadIndex = context.ThreadIndex Integer runIndex = 0//context.RunCount String subjectKey = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("subjectKey")
int factor = (courseDurationInDays * runIndex) + 1
String now = new Date().format("yyyy-MM-dd'T16:42:45.0Z'")
def d = new Date().parse("yyyy-MM-dd", firstCourseStartDate) String drugStartDate = d.format("yyyyMMdd")
String courseStartDate = d.plus(factor).format("yyyy-MM-dd") String drugEndDate = d.plus(factor).format("yyyyMMdd")
String courseEndDate = d.plus(factor + courseDurationInDays).format("yyyy-MM-dd") def cycleNumber = String.valueOf( startCycleNumber + runIndex) String aeStartDate = d.plus(factor + 2).format("yyyy-MM-dd'T16:42:45.0Z'")
String messageNumber = "" + System.currentTimeMillis()
testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].setPropertyValue("messageNumber", messageNumber)
testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].setPropertyValue("cycleNumber", cycleNumber) testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].setPropertyValue("now", now) testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].setPropertyValue("courseStartDate", courseStartDate) testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].setPropertyValue("courseEndDate", courseEndDate) testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].setPropertyValue("runIndex", String.valueOf(runIndex)) testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].setPropertyValue("threadIndex", String.valueOf(threadIndex))
String aeOneExternalId = "aeOne-${subjectKey}-${threadIndex}-${runIndex}" String aeTwoExternalId = "aeTwo-${subjectKey}-${threadIndex}-${runIndex}"
String reactionStartDate = new Date().format("yyyyMMdd") testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].setPropertyValue("reactionStartDate", reactionStartDate) testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].setPropertyValue("drugEndDate", drugEndDate) testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].setPropertyValue("drugStartDate", drugStartDate)
testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].setPropertyValue("aeOneExternalId", String.valueOf(aeOneExternalId)) testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].setPropertyValue("aeTwoExternalId", String.valueOf(aeTwoExternalId))
log.info(" User : ${threadIndex} , Run : ${runIndex} - subjectKey : ${subjectKey}, courseStartDate:${courseStartDate}, courseEndDate:${courseEndDate}, cycleNumber: ${cycleNumber}, aeStartDate : ${aeStartDate}")

import com.jcraft.jsch.Channel import com.jcraft.jsch.ChannelSftp import com.jcraft.jsch.JSch import com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException import com.jcraft.jsch.Session import com.jcraft.jsch.SftpATTRS import com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils
String messageNumber = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("messageNumber") String reportId = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("reportId") String subjectKey = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("subjectKey") String aeOneExternalId = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("aeOneExternalId") String reactionStartDate = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("reactionStartDate") String aeTwoExternalId = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("aeTwoExternalId") String tac = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("tac") String drugStartDate = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("drugStartDate") String drugEndDate = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("drugEndDate") String cycleNumber = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("cycleNumber") String studyId= testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("studyId")
String Baselineperformancestatusscale = testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Baselineperformancestatusscale") log.info("Baselineperformancestatusscale: ${Baselineperformancestatusscale}") String Baselineperformancenumber = testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Baseline performance status at initiation of protocol") log.info("Baselineperformancenumber: ${Baselineperformancenumber}"); String DiseaseName = testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("DiseaseName") log.info("DiseaseName: ${DiseaseName}"); String OtherSiteofMetastaticDisease = testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("OtherSiteofMetastaticDisease") log.info("OtherSiteofMetastaticDisease: ${OtherSiteofMetastaticDisease}") String PriorTherapyAgents = testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("PriorTherapyAgents") log.info("PriorTherapyAgents: ${PriorTherapyAgents}")
String PrimarySiteofDisease = testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Primary Site of Disease") log.info("PriorTherapyAgents: ${PrimarySiteofDisease}") String PreExistingCondition = testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Pre-existing Condition") log.info("PreExistingCondition: ${PreExistingCondition}") String OtherCause = testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Other Cause") log.info("OtherCause: ${OtherCause}") String MetastaticSite = testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Metastatic Site") log.info("MetastaticSite: ${MetastaticSite}")
log.info("message number: ${messageNumber}"); //construct an e2b file String e2bXML = """<ichicsr lang="en"> <ichicsrmessageheader> <messagetype>ichicsr</messagetype> Sender</messagesenderidentifier> <messagereceiveridentifier>2014.2.0 Receiver</messagereceiveridentifier> <messagedateformat>204</messagedateformat> <messagedate>20141217200315</messagedate> </ichicsrmessageheader> <safetyreport> <safetyreportid>${reportId}</safetyreportid> <companynumb>${reportId}</companynumb> <primarysource> <sponsorstudynumb>${studyId}</sponsorstudynumb> </primarysource> <physicianemail>physicianone3@email.com</physicianemail> <physiciangivename>Physician_given_name</physiciangivename> <physicianfamilyname>Phyfamilyname</physicianfamilyname> <physicianmiddlename>Phymdlname</physicianmiddlename> <physicianphone>7037879658</physicianphone> <recipientemails>vasudev.chatti.semanticbits.com</recipientemails> <patient> <!--study site NCI id--> <subjectstudysiteid>MN008</subjectstudysiteid> <!--study subject id--> <patientinvestigationnumb>${subjectKey}</patientinvestigationnumb> <medicalhistoryepisode> <baselineperformancescale>${Baselineperformancestatusscale}</baselineperformancescale> <baselineperformancenumber>${Baselineperformancenumber}</baselineperformancenumber> </medicalhistoryepisode> <!-- AE1 --> <reaction> <aeexternalid>${aeOneExternalId}</aeexternalid> <primaryaeflag>1</primaryaeflag> <primarysourcereaction>VerbatimOne</primarysourcereaction> <reactionstartdateformat>102</reactionstartdateformat> <reactionstartdate>${reactionStartDate}</reactionstartdate> <reactionoutcome>3</reactionoutcome> </reaction> <reaction> <termhighlighted>3</termhighlighted> <aeexternalid>${aeOneExternalId}</aeexternalid> <factor>737664</factor> <factortype>course agent</factortype> <attribution>5</attribution> </reaction> <reaction> <termhighlighted>3</termhighlighted> <aeexternalid>${aeOneExternalId}</aeexternalid> <factor>362856</factor> <factortype>course agent</factortype> <attribution>5</attribution> </reaction> <reaction> A single E2B file can contain multiple prior therapies.--> <medicalhistoryepisode> <!--Prior Therapy For Primary Disease--> <patientepisodename>${PriorTherapyAgents}</patientepisodename> <patientmedicalcomment>Prior Therapy</patientmedicalcomment> </medicalhistoryepisode>

It should be accompanied by an attribution (<medicalepisodeassess>).--> <medicalhistoryepisode> <patientepisodename>Glioblastoma multiforme</patientepisodename> <patientmedicalcomment>Study Disease</patientmedicalcomment> </medicalhistoryepisode> <medicalhistoryepisode> <patientepisodename>${PrimarySiteofDisease}</patientepisodename> <patientmedicalcomment>Disease Site</patientmedicalcomment> </medicalhistoryepisode> <medicalhistoryepisode> <patientepisodename>Convulsions</patientepisodename> <patientmedicalcomment>Other Cause</patientmedicalcomment> </medicalhistoryepisode> <test> <testdateformat>102</testdateformat> <testdate>20130201</testdate> <testname>Bacterial Infection NOS</testname> <infectiousagent>Streptococcus</infectiousagent> <infectionsite>APPENDIX</infectionsite> </test> <test> <testname>Ammonia</testname> <testresult>15</testresult> <testunit>mEq/L</testunit> <testdateformat>102</testdateformat> <testdate>20140225</testdate> <testtype>Baseline</testtype> </test>

<senderfirstname>Alfred</senderfirstname> <sendermidname>Dynamite</sendermidname> <senderlastname>Nobel</senderlastname> <senderphonenumber>703-787-9656</senderphonenumber> <senderfaxnumber>703-787-9656</senderfaxnumber> <senderemailid>vasudev.chatti@semanticbits.com</senderemailid> <ptweight>50</ptweight> <ptheight>100</ptheight> <indadminflag>1</indadminflag> <narrativeincludeclinical>the description or narrative of the event</narrativeincludeclinical> <retreatedflag>2</retreatedflag> </summary> </patient> <medicalhistoryepisode> <autopsyreportflag>1</autopsyreportflag> <consultsflag>1</consultsflag> <dischargesummaryflag>1</dischargesummaryflag> <flowsheetscrfsflag>1</flowsheetscrfsflag> <labreportsflag>1</labreportsflag> <obaformsflag>2</obaformsflag> <pathologyreportflag>2</pathologyreportflag> <progressnotesflag>1</progressnotesflag> <radiologyreportflag>2</radiologyreportflag> <referrallettersflag>2</referrallettersflag> <irbsummaryreportflag>1</irbsummaryreportflag> <otheradditionalflag>2</otheradditionalflag> <doclist>this is the doc list</doclist> </medicalhistoryepisode> </safetyreport> </ichicsr>"""
String homeFolder = new File(System.getProperty("user.home")) File e2bTestFolder = new File(homeFolder, "e2btest") e2bTestFolder.mkdir() File e2bFile = new File(e2bTestFolder, "e2b_${subjectKey}_input.xml") e2bFile.text = e2bXML testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].setPropertyValue("e2bInputFileName", e2bFile.getName()) log.info(" Generated E2B File: ${e2bFile.getName()}")
//now upload the e2bFileToSubmit String e2bInPath = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("e2bInFolder") //call ftp client and put the file in e2bInPath String server = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("server") String username = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("username") String password = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("password") int port = Integer.parseInt(testRunner.testCase.testSteps["course-properties"].getPropertyValue("port"))
JSch jsch = new JSch(); Session session = null; try { //Connect to sftp server session = jsch.getSession(username, server, port) session.setConfig("StrictHostKeyChecking", "no") session.setPassword(password) session.connect() Channel channel = session.openChannel("sftp") channel.connect(); ChannelSftp sftpChannel = (ChannelSftp) channel //Go to e2b input folder sftpChannel.cd("${e2bInPath}/") log.info("current directory after mkdir : ${sftpChannel.pwd()}") FileInputStream inputStream = new FileInputStream(e2bFile) //copy e2b file into e2binput folder sftpChannel.put(inputStream, e2bFile.getName()) sftpChannel.exit();
} catch (JSchException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } catch (SftpException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } finally { session.disconnect(); }
